description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow minor alteration in relation to planning permission reference 203935FUL dated 07/04/2021 for 'Construction of two and three storey building comprising 9 residential units; and provision of associated private amenity areas, cycle parking, landscaping, refuse storage and associated works (following demolition of existing buildings)'
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): 3206-CB-A-DR-10-00 Rev. C; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-01 Rev. B; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-02 Rev. B; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-03 Rev. C; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-51 Rev. A; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-52 Rev. B; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-54 Rev. B; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-55 Rev. B.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
